memberdef.argsstring: (led_strip_t *strip, uint32_t index, uint32_t red, uint32_t green, uint32_t blue)
memberdef.name: led_strip_rmt_set_pixel

memberdef.argsstring: (led_strip_t *strip, uint32_t index, uint32_t red, uint32_t green, uint32_t blue, uint32_t white)
memberdef.name: led_strip_rmt_set_pixel_rgbw

briefdescription.para: Create LED strip based on RMT TX channel.

listitem.para: ESP_OK: create LED strip handle successfully
ESP_ERR_INVALID_ARG: create LED strip handle failed because of invalid argument
ESP_ERR_NO_MEM: create LED strip handle failed because of out of memory
ESP_FAIL: create LED strip handle failed because some other error
